info.additionalInfo: New Updated theme. ♣Color to text changed♣ ♣Designed Cards for the Admins and Moderators♣ ♣A Few forum colors changed♣ ♣Normal Candy Players have personal Profile Card♣ ♣Grey and Brown Colors♣ ♣Welcome, (PLAYERNAME) has it's color changed♣ ♣Episode No.(Number) Has it's color changed as well♣ ♣Custom Cursor♣ Thank you to BarbieGirl to help me start this when i asked help in a Forum Click her name to go to her profile! and thank you ChromeHearts for critiquing my theme a bit!
